org.cloudgraph.hbase.io

Interface TableOperation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TableState
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    TableReader, TableWriter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphTableReader, GraphTableWriter

    public interface TableOperation
extends TableState
    The the pooled connection and other context for read or write operations for a specific HBase table.
    Since:
    0.5.1
    Author:
    Scott Cinnamond
     

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DistributedOperation getDistributedOperation()
      Returns the distributed context associated with this table operation context.
      Table getTable()
      Returns the HBase table pooled connection for this context.
      boolean hasConnection()
      Returns whether there is an active HBase table pooled connection for this context.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.cloudgraph.state.TableState

        getTableConfig
